title: Lol matchmaking system sucks
body:
Hello! i dont know if theres someone with same thing in mind but, first i must say Im not pro player but i started playing ranked games only and always when im in promo my team goes and feed,they dive then they cry when im not dive like idiot into fights.Last game i went 10/4  and was most feeded player could kill anyone 1vs 1 BUT my team went 
JAX 8/14
YASUO  3/12
MISS 2/6
LEONA 0/10
And this didint happen only once and now im crying here it happened everytime on my promo once i went straight to promo to demotion becuase all games after promo was troll feeder games.I play almost every time best in my team in low bronze elo but i cant carry whole team my self when all enemies already fed...any tips?my mmr cant be so bad if im 54%win rate top lane...but i hate when this happens i like playing and i pay riots salary with buying skins and shit but i think everytime when this happens i quit this.

replies.body:
Same for me and this new season its worse. People with 30% winrate that should be playing vs lower ranks go to play vs higher ranks. 

Like HOW???
I wonder why they continue to have a 30% winrate. . . {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

> [{quoted}](name=PB4UAME,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KtzEiviK,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-03-07T14:13:39.286+0000)
>
> I wonder why they continue to have a 30% winrate. . . {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

Because they dont belong in that elo and they dont demote. If that is not enough instead of playing vs gold 3-4 or even silver because the 30% winrate he plays vs an entire team of platinums 2--3 normal mmr.

> [{quoted}](name=Î›VICII,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KtzEiviK,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-03-06T20:57:58.265+0000)
>
> Same for me and this new season its worse. People with 30% winrate that should be playing vs lower ranks go to play vs higher ranks. 
> 
> Like HOW???

I literally have like 38 percent win rate in bronze 95% on support. Nothing ever changes, and it just sounds like the community thinks MM is getting much worse.

im bronze 2. there was a gold 4 in my ranked game. 

don't waste ur time on this crap game.

people will say...bb b but ur mmr must be so high! Yeah well then let me beat bronzes to climb out of bronze. then when I get to gold, I will beat golds to get out of gold. It's completely unfair that I have to beat golds to climb out of bronze when this gold just has to beat my team of silvers to get LP in gold. (yeah, my team was 4 silvers, but wtf ? )

make the 5th teammate a silver then and leave me with the bronzies. Lost that game too. So the gold gets LP for beating a silver, and I lose LP in bronze bc matched against a gold???

after that game i started trolling ranked. Not inting or anything, but trolling basically; not tryharding at all. Leona mid let's go!

tear my League into pieces
this is my last eSport
I dont know why this comment is so underrated. That song is really good.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/lKnEdqUh-looking-for-a-topmid-duo

Riot legit gives 0 fucks about feeders. Posting about it once in boards isn't gonna fix it shit been like this for years. All riot cares is about Riot Points.

Hey man. I remember the thread you made about the 4 guys that stayed at your base and did nothing for the whole game. Its a shame this players still play and are not punished. They removed your thread. I also made a post about that. It tilts me that they didn't do something.

> [{quoted}](name=Blaxonec,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KtzEiviK,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-03-07T07:15:11.558+0000)
>
> Hey man. I remember the thread you made about the 4 guys that stayed at your base and did nothing for the whole game. Its a shame this players still play and are not punished. They removed your thread. I also made a post about that. It tilts me that they didn't do something.

Sadly, there are to few of us willing to call Rito out on this crap. If the community doesn't give a response comparable to the one given to the DZ Klein situation, Riot will never own up and apologize.
This my experience too.

Posted this before, the match making has always been garbage, the ranking system gamed nonstop, but this year is an entire new level of utter garbage. Literally every match the skill gap among all the players is believably high. Na not complaining acting like I belong in challenger, but I certainly do not belong in the same elo with most of these people i am being forced to play with. 

Its like not even close, and honestly its not only high elo i am in gold plat range and its abysmal...its not "feeders" even its people who literally dont even know how to play the game....all dmg item fiora with 4k dmg to champs never left lane, wasnt camped just oblivious how to play, jungle kayne roaming around clueless level 4 when adc is level 7 not counter jungled, nothing just utterly abysmal at the game and I get these people in high gold low plat matches...

I'm Gold 4 and I just wanted to play a normals game the other day, and my team had one Bronze 1 player and the rest unranked (all lower Lv than me btw and I'm only 124) but the enemy team consisted of all players that were more than twice my level (2 past Lv 300) and one was Diamond 4, One was Platinum 4 and the rest were silver. Like what!? you can imagine it was a very frustrating game for me and my team even if it was just normals.

Its the matchmaker MMR dogma. If you win too much it tries to lower your winrate to 50% by giving you bad teams. Usually you hit promos after a win streak and your MMR spikes. The matchmaker MMR correction will usually over shoot you low, and you will have to climb back. It's awful. Whether you win or lose a game has little to do with how you play most of the time. It has more to do with how much of a handi-cap matchmaker gave you when assembling your team. Have you ever noticed you have games where you don't do much and you win? And then other games where you carry hard, yet lose? Thats matchmaker assigning you a handi-cap when it picks your teammates. Its utter trash system.
It's your fault, should've made it to 40,so that Yasuo could carry you simply because he bought 2 items,but you're on EUNE, so that would never happen xd,fuck my server man..

Somehow only Na and Kr have this new ranked system but Eu are also affected by matchmaking in this season. Riot had to change something in matchmaking. There is no other explanation for why it is so shit right now. It wasn't this bad even in S8, which was bad already.

> [{quoted}](name=QancerClown,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KtzEiviK,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2019-03-07T12:13:04.158+0000)
>
> Somehow only Na and Kr have this new ranked system but Eu are also affected by matchmaking in this season. Riot had to change something in matchmaking. There is no other explanation for why it is so shit right now. It wasn't this bad even in S8, which was bad already.

It's not any better. Its the same shit.

I am in the exact same situation as you are right now. I am a Bronze top laner in NA and I climbed from Iron 2 to Bronze 1 in a week with a 65-70% winrate and now that I am Bronze 1, my winrate is 40%. 70% of my games I get someone who is either totally incompetent or feeds the entire game. I win lane 75-80% of my games and my teams are just absolutely terrible. Does anybody have any advice? It is impossible for me to climb to Silver because my team feeds almost every single game and I am stuck in the middle.
Should've seen the 0 / 22 Heimer, 2 / 10 Camille, 0 / 9 Lucian, and 4 / 7 Lulu in my promos...

Is it worth investing time in this game or not ?

What you think ?

> [{quoted}](name=VisArch,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KtzEiviK,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2019-03-07T14:57:03.335+0000)
>
> Is it worth investing time in this game or not ?
> 
> What you think ?

no. It was a frustrating experience with a company that doesnt respect its players, and a crappy ranked system with a hidden MMR that makes no sense at all and is insanely frustrating to deal with.

No, don't play it, there are better esports 1v1 or even 5v5 with better matchmaking than this one, you will just get frustration in your life and you will waste your time climbing because you needed to grind a shit ton of games.

It's only worth it to play with friends in normals or in duoq, to be honest.

Definitely! Your are at the beginning of a wonderful experience. At your level you shouldn't need to worry too much about matchmaking. Instead focus on learning your play-style and preferences! Hopefully by the time when you can play ranked,  the matchmaking will be fixed!

EDIT: Not sarcasm
/s

Stop playing ranked. 

Stop paying Riot.

Seems pretty simple. Solves your problem. Ranked upsets you so, stop playing ranked. Don't upset yourself. You get frustrated because you "pay Riot's salary" So stop. 

Simple.
You know that even with "perfect" matchmaking, games like this would still happen right?

I don't believe that. If matchmaking was "perfect", every single game would have players of equal skill. The current system is far from that.

It is possible that the game in question was just a team of players having really bad games, but it is more likely that they don't have decent skills like positioning and map awareness. A "perfect" system would equalize all the different skills a player needs.

Put two players of equal skills one against each other and watch how it turns.

Matchmaking and snowballing are two really different things. Once one of the player has a small edge on the other, he can crush the other player again and again. That's snowballing.

Now if both these players are of equal skills, and you make them play a hundred game they will average a 50% winrate. But most of the games will still look like they are one sided. And that's even more likely to happen when you put different champions in one lane that counters each others.

I mean, if i'm equally skilled as my opponents but he counters me early AND he gets help from his jungler, do you think it will not look like i'm a trash compared to him ? He'll have more farm and will probably dive me with his jungler once they are level 7.

The "problem" you experience is snowball, not matchmaking.
I sorta agree, but disagree. Learn to play from behind. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=Raiyza,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KtzEiviK,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2019-03-06T22:37:02.810+0000)
>
> I don't believe that. If matchmaking was "perfect", every single game would have players of equal skill. The current system is far from that.
> 
> It is possible that the game in question was just a team of players having really bad games, but it is more likely that they don't have decent skills like positioning and map awareness. A "perfect" system would equalize all the different skills a player needs.

Doesnâ€™t matter, even with equal skill, people still feed. Humans arenâ€™t consistent in literally anything, one game you are Faker and the next, you are xfioramaster18.

and that's fine, I understand bad games. But the issue is, with this mess of a matchmaking system, games where multiple players are just making stupid mistakes are *consistent*. I swear, every single game I play (in gold elo), I will see multiple players refuse to ward, fail to  pay attention to the map, even fail to  engage fights properly. It's maddening.

With a perfect machtmaking you could actually face better opponents instead of having worse teammates in promos.
Or with a perfect matchmaking promo games wouldn't have existed...

But maybe the Riot's definition of "perfect matchmaking" is rigging promotion games and slown down the climb of people and then stop them from playing the game because they don't feel rewarded enough for all the grind through their climb and this ends shrinking the player base of rankeds. In that case, yeah, they made the perfect matchmaking.

Then we get surprised why people is playing less and less ranked games and the player base is shrking and not renewing.

> [{quoted}](name=Heos00,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KtzEiviK,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2019-03-08T20:43:45.618+0000)
>
> With a perfect machtmaking you could actually face better opponents instead of having worse teammates in promos.
> Or with a perfect matchmaking promo games wouldn't have existed...
> 
> But maybe the Riot's definition of "perfect matchmaking" is rigging promotion games and slown down the climb of people and then stop them from playing the game because they don't feel rewarded enough for all the grind through their climb and this ends shrinking the player base of rankeds. In that case, yeah, they made the perfect matchmaking.
> 
> Then we get surprised why people is playing less and less ranked games and the player base is shrking and not renewing.

I'm saying that even with perfect matchmaking, games like this would still happen anyway because even with better opponents, or properly skilled opponents...people feed.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KtzEiviK,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2019-03-08T20:47:51.220+0000)
>
> I'm saying that even with perfect matchmaking, games like this would still happen anyway because even with better opponents, or properly skilled opponents...people feed.

I don't think anyone is talking about the odd feeder. It's having %70 of games be unwinnable because 3/5 team members feed, don't know how to play macro game, make terrible choices, or just troll/afk and force a loss. Matchmaking has never been this bad.

Maybe it will continue to be games like this, but they wouldn't feel (and be) frustrating and artificially as now they are. And the remaining frustration of those games could be adressed by individual LP gaining by performance. But yeah, in the end, they have their own definition of perfection.

> [{quoted}](name=Heos00,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KtzEiviK,comment-id=0001000200000000,timestamp=2019-03-08T20:58:36.447+0000)
>
> Maybe it will continue to be games like this, but they wouldn't feel (and be) frustrating and artificially as now they are. And the remaining frustration of those games could be adressed by individual LP gaining by performance. But yeah, in the end, they have their own definition of perfection.

They will still feel like this when you get the person going 0/X and they wonâ€™t do that because it is a team game and like literally every other team based game and sport in the world, if your team loses so do you.
Did you know that the Rain in Spain has nothing to do with OP issues ether?

> [{quoted}](name=XXXMurderPenguin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KtzEiviK,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-03-06T20:50:44.261+0000)
>

Hitting promos after a win streak is the most disappointing moment for me because I would be pretty sure I will begin my losing streak. I don't mind people trying new things and competing in ranked, but I would definitely like that in every promo i would get to play with someone who is close to their promos as well or at least be in promos.

Um everybody feeds at some point.

That's all I have to say about that...

> [{quoted}](name=MrMashpotatohead,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KtzEiviK,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-03-06T23:39:34.256+0000)
>

>

Keep running into people who are on sprees of feeding, had a ryze the other day sell all his items buy mob boots and an aether wisp and run it down mid. Checked his match history and that was the third time he'd done that this week, it's not uncommon writing off people being twats as just a bad game bro is  a bad meme.

i made that post and i have permaban on that account now because i said to my jg after 14 day ban " U cant gank us or do drakes what can u do then mate " then he run to my lane 2 v 1 bottom and then i said " well atleast u can feed them" permabanned now im playing against diamonds in silver because diamonds got placed low gold in placements lmaao nice rito

While I do agree there are issues in matchmaking. I find it fascinating the people that slander supports talking about 0/10 Leona, or 4/7 Lulu. I'm sure if that Leona was 10/0 you'd actually be just as mad, because supports aren't supposed to be getting kills. When you talk about supports, you should include assists. Really you should for anyone. A 1/5 midlaner sounds bad, but if they are 1/5/20... that's not as bad. People should not be so focused on only the kills when claiming their team's short comings, just saying.

I completely agree.

I recently checked the LoL Youtube channel and the leaders of the ranked team said this. " Our goal is to have fast matchmaking, so not only have we added autofill, but sometimes, players will not get teammates of their skill level. 

I gotta call this bullsh*t!!!!!

This means that your MMR will only affect your LP gains and not your matchmaking, so they should call it LPCR (LP change ratings).

People would rather get good teammates exchange for an extra 10 mins of waiting. This makes the matchmaking system complete RNG, where the odds of good teammates are random. 

PLS RITO, SHOW US OUR MMR TO CURE CANCER!!!!!!1

The problem is I get to S1 and right on que, the feeding bot lanes appear and I get demoited after 5 losses....I mean every time, wtf is this shit. Riot needs to fix this bullshit, no I dont want to carry a 1 7 adc with an 0 7 support...â€¦.espcecially game after game, fuck that bullshit
reset rank, reset rank, reset rank

I feel the Same way. I Started at Silver 2 66LP and After 100 Games i am Silver 2 20LP. I dont judt loose bei my mates are bad , but last 20 Games its really difficult to win with 6/2 or better, even just 1 is feeding. 
I have my third loosing Streak in 20 Games with 4 looses. 
And at this Point i am not the only reason for getting demoted. Riot matchmaking Is Bad because i am S2 and play with Bronze 1 vs Gold 3/4. 
and i mean when i loose games its always 100% the fault of all Players in the loosing Team. So MMR makes not much sense aswell ðŸ˜…. 

{{champion:18}}

50 percent of winning rate is nice.
However instead of matching better players as you improve your skills, they will simply ruin half of your game by matching trolls.
Remember bad players are also part of the game, please consider their feelings!
Also you still have half of your game not ruined so please enjoy.

Excuse me. I seriously can understand your pain. Believe or not it happens even in higher elos, and there are and will be games where you just lost on champion select, because of your team players, picks whatsoever. However, I can't find any good reason to someone to be so hardstuck in low elo while trying to seriously improve. I don't.
I find it very easly to comeback on those ranks and even literally 1vs9. I'm not telling you to "git gud", but basicly my advice is to stop looking at your team performance and start thinking only about yours and don't tilt. Also, blaming Riot for "their stupid matchamking" (wich LMAO is so fvcking true) won't help at all.

But yeah, this season has been a big fiesta. I've met many players in Masters that actually have something like 40% Win Rate, I just don't get it, how is it even possible but whatever.

EDIT: Yeah. I just played a game where my bot lane was Platinum 1 and the enemy Team was with 3 Diamond I, 1 Master and 1 Diamond III, meanwhile I was the only Master in my team  with one Diamond I and one Diamond II.
And the Diamond I was a pepega, great.
